title: SQLSELECT Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLSELECT Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
SELECT
The
SELECT
command is used to select data 
from a database. The data returned is stored in a result table, called the result set.
The following SQL statement selects the "CustomerName" and "City" columns 
from the "Customers" table:
Example
SELECT CustomerName, City FROM Customers;

The following SQL statement selects all the columns from the "Customers" 
table:
Example
SELECT * FROM Customers;

Reference

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers SQLSELECT Keyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use SQLSELECT Keyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of SQLSELECT Keyword and how to apply it in your projects.
